import { memo } from 'react' import { vietnamese, english } from '../../Languages/InputNameInformationService' import { vietnameseRoomType, englishRoomType } from '../../Languages/RoomType' import { vietnameseBedType, englishBedType } from '../../Languages/BedType' function ViewInformationRooms({ languageSelected, formFields }) { console.log(formFields.length) let languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) let roomTypeList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishRoomType : vietnameseRoomType) let bedTypeList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishBedType : vietnameseBedType) const handleBlur = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #D9D9D9' } const handleFocus = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } return ( <> {[...formFields].map((form, index) => (
{form.showHide ? <>
{formFields.length > 1 && } transition> handleDeleteForm(index)}>Delete }
handleClickShowHide(index)} className='space-icon-show-container bd-t'>
:
Room {index + 1}
{formFields.length > 1 && } transition> handleDeleteForm(index)}>Delete } {form.bedRoomPhoto.length > 0 && <>
}
handleClickShowHide(index)} className='space-icon-show-container bd-t'>
} {form.showHide &&
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} onChange={(e) => handleInputRoomName(e.target.value, index)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='numberOfRoom' className="input-inline" type='number' onChange={(e) => handleInputNumberOfRooms(e.target.value, index)} min={0} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='numberOfPeopleOnRoom' className="input-inline" type='number' min={0} onChange={(e) => handleInputNumberOfPeople(e.target.value, index)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='roomSize' className="input-inline" type='number' min={0} onChange={(e) => handleInputRoomSize(e.target.value, index)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='dailyPrice' className="input-inline" type='number' min={0} onChange={(e) => handleInputDailyPrice(e.target.value, index)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='holidayPrice' className="input-inline" type='number' min={0} onChange={(e) => handleInputHolidayPrice(e.target.value, index)} />
